pages.title: Picasso Triggerfish
pages.text: Rhinecanthus assasi, commonly known as the Assasi triggerfish or Arabian picassofish, is a species of fish in the family Balistidae, the triggerfishes.

pages.title: Picasso Triggerfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
